summary: P1.6 Sizing Breakdown testing completed - Backend APIs fully functional with transparent breakdown array and formula. Frontend SizingBreakdown component displays correctly with decision summary cards.
passed_tests: Backend /terminal API returns sizing.breakdown array with 5 factors (BASE_PRESET, CONSENSUS, CONFLICT, RISK, VOLATILITY)
Backend /terminal returns sizing.formula string with multiplication operations
SizingBreakdown component renders correctly on FractalPage with breakdown table structure
Decision Summary Cards display (Consensus, Conflict, Vol Regime)
Volatility Card shows CRISIS regime with appropriate multipliers (Ã—0.25 size, -15pp confidence)
Chart mode switcher functionality works (Price Chart/Fractal Overlay)
Final Position Size displays correctly (0.0% in crisis mode)
Blocker indicators work (LOW_CONFIDENCE, HIGH_ENTROPY, VOL_CRISIS, EXTREME_VOL_SPIKE)
All P1.4-P1.6 volatility features integrated and working
Admin volatility attribution and timeline endpoints functional
Response times good (0.09-0.13s for API calls)

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (minor regex syntax error in formula detection but all core components working)
